T02D2862:199b-1: rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas //
T02D2862:199b-2: snod gtsang mar sha khrag dang bral ba'i gtor ma legs par bshams la /
T02D2862:199b-3: stong pa'i ngang las yi ge pam la byung ba'i rin po che padma'i snod du /
T02D2862:199b-4: gtor ma'i rdzas rnams yi ge aa dkar po las lha rdzas kyi bdud rtsir gyur par bsams la /
T02D2862:200a-1: h'um zhes brjod cing ji ltar 'dod par byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2862:200a-2: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D2862:200a-3: zer gyis 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i lha rnams
T02D2862:200a-4: mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la /
T02D2862:200a-5: phyag btsal zhing mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D2862:200a-6: lha rnams kyi stong pa'i rang bzhin las ni yi
T02D2862:200a-7: ge h'um las de nyid kyis mtshan pa'i rdo rje
T02D2862:200a-8: rtse gcig pa 'od zer gyi sbu gu dang ldan
T02D2862:200a-9: pas bdud rtsi'i gtor ma 'dren par bsam zhing /
T02D2862:200a-10: aom aa mo gha p'a sha hr'i: ai mam ba
T02D2862:200a-11: lim grihna ma ma sarba p'a pam sh'antim ku ru
T02D2862:200a-12: sv'ah'a / zhes lan lnga'i bar du brjod de /
T02D2862:200a-13: se gol gyi sgra bya zhing gtor ma dbul par bya'o //
T02D2862:200a-14: de nas yang dag par mchod cing dril bu'i sgra
T02D2862:200a-15: dang ldan pas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod de
T02D2862:200a-16: / mngon par 'dod pa'i don du gsol ba gdab la /
T02D2862:200a-17: yi ge brgya pa'i sngags brjod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ste /
T02D2862:200a-18: aom khyed kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2862:200a-19: don yod zhags pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga / kha
T02D2862:200a-20: che'i pandi ta chen po sh'akya shr'i bha dras mdzad
